thread.section_title: MemoryC.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MemoryC.com | www.memoryc.com
thread.title: Peadar Farrell

author: Peadar Farrell
title: Peadar Farrell
text:
I buy a few times a year and have never had the slightest problem with their service or products. Your purchases arrives at your door in a day or two.
A good clear website items cleary specified and on a number of occasions I gave them my computer details to check that I had select the right upgrade part. They responded immeaditly and correctly so I have no hesitation in recommending them as good guys to deal with.
